1:
--------------------
Text: The House of Tiny Tearaways: The show brings three families experiencing problems into a large, purpose-built house where they are monitored and helped for a week.
Triplets:<The House of Tiny Tearaways
2:
--------------------
Text: The House of Tiny Tearaways:  The show is vaguely similar to programmes like "Big Brother", in that all the rooms have cameras in them and the families are frequently monitored in their activities with the audience shown highlights of a particular day.
